mapper.insert: insert into t_secondlevel(second_name, second_desc, first_id) VALUES (#{secondName},#{secondDesc},#{firstLevel.firstId})
mapper.select: select second.*,first.*,property.property_id, property.property_name, property.property_desc, property.common_value from t_secondlevel second left join t_firstlevel first on second.first_id=first.first_id left join t_property property on property.second_id=second.second_id where second.second_id=#{secondId}
